name: Oren Kurland
content: Kurland, Oren - The Faculty of Data and Decision Sciences		 :		The Faculty of Data and Decision Sciences Kurland, Oren - The Faculty of Data and Decision Sciences Kurland, Oren Professor kurland@technion.ac.il + 972-73-378-4500 Bloomfield 411 Professor Oren Kurland Joined the Faculty of Industrial Engineering and Management, Technion in 2006. He received his Ph.D. in Computer Science from Cornell University the same year. Oren currently serves as the head of the Information Systems area. Research areas Machine Learning Mathematical Modeling
